mapper.select: select *, datediff(wDate,now()) as date_diff, timestampdiff(hour, wDate, now()) as hour_diff, (select count(*) from reply where boardIdx = board.idx) as replyCnt from board order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo}, #{pageSize};

select.if: select idx,title from board where idx<#{idx} order by idx desc limit 1;
select idx,title from board where idx>#{idx} order by idx limit 1;

mapper.select: select * from complaint where complaintidx = #{idx} and complaintMid = #{complaintMid};
select * from goodcheck where contentidx = #{idx} and nickName = #{nickName};
select * from reply where boardIdx = #{boardIdx} order by idx desc limit 1;
select *, datediff(wDate, now()) as date_diff, timestampdiff(hour, wDate, now()) as hour_diff from reply where boardIdx = #{idx} order by re_order desc;
select * from board where nickName = #{nickName} and delCheck = 'OK' order by idx;
select * from board where mid = #{mid} order by idx;
select count(*) from board where mid = #{mid} and delCheck = 'NO';
mapper.update: update board set readNum = readNum+1 where idx = #{idx};
update board set delCheck = 'OK', delDate = now() where idx = #{idx} and mid = #{mid};

update.if: update board set good = good+1 where idx = #{idx};
update board set good = good-1 where idx = #{idx};

mapper.update: update reply set re_order = re_order + 1 where boardIdx = #{boardIdx} and re_order > #{re_order};
update board set delCheck = 'OK', delDate = now() where mid = #{mid} and idx = #{delidx};
mapper.delete: delete from goodcheck where contentidx = #{idx} and nickName = #{nickName};
delete from reply where idx = #{idx} and nickName = #{nickName};
